subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Ray Ray McElrathbey will graduate from Clemson on Saturday. McElrathbey, a running back, gained national attention in 2006 for raising his then 11-year-old brother, Fahmarr, while their mother dealt with drug problems. He missed last season with a knee injury but has two years of eligibility left. He will play at Howard this fall.
